    • Uses of Vector in game

      Methods in game that return Vector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector Vector.addVector(Vector v)
      Add v's components to this vector and return this Vector
      Vector Vector.invert()
      Invert both of this' components - change this vector to <1/x, 1/y> -- and returns this Vector.
      Vector Vector.mult(double s)
      Multiply both of this vector's components by s and return this Vector.
      Vector Vector.to(Vector b)
      Return a new vector from this to b.
      Vector Vector.unit()
      Make this vector have length 1, with the same direction, and Return this Vector.
